### Bug Fixes

-   Make the `capture` function of `buildCancellablePromise` an identity function
    from a type perspective.

## 1.1.1

### Bug Fixes

-   Fix `CancellablePromise<T>` not being assignable to `Promise<T>`

## 1.0.0

Initial release
